summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 13586, entitled "An Ordinance prohibiting the erection or maintenance or operation of hospitals or sanitariums within one thousand (1,000) feet of any public park, park-way, public school building or public play ground in the City of Seattle and providing a penalty for violation," approved April 19, 1906 and Ordinance No. 15609, approved March 21, 1907, amendatory thereof.
